attributes.action: A military intervention in Syria which aims to remove Assad from power
attributes.additional_details:
Syria is in crisis because a brutal dictator wants to prolong his grip on power. This must end now.


https://www.mercycorps.org.uk/articles/iraq-jordan-lebanon-syria-turkey/quick-facts-what-you-need-know-about-syria-crisis
attributes.background: 500,000 dead. 11 million Syrians out of a population of 23 million are refugees. The suffering the Syrian people are facing must stop. Children, women and disabled people are not getting crucial help because they are cut off by brutal sieges. Now is the time to help the innoncent people of Syria.
